newsitem.title: USA: Cablevision stake lifted by Gabelli group.
newsitem.headline: Cablevision stake lifted by Gabelli group.

text.p: A group led by New York investment manager Mario Gabelli said Monday it raised its stake in Cablevision Systems Corp to 3,215,797 Class A common shares or 24.21 percent from 20.64 percent previously held.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its latest transactions include a net of 48,900 common shares bought on Nov 12 at prices ranging from $26.7159 to $32.6379 per share.
The stake includes 24,597 Class A common shares it will receive on conversion of preferred shares of Cablevision that it holds, the filing said.
Cablevision, of Woodbury, New York, operates cable television systems throughout the United States with nearly three million subscribers.
